I have played this game almost on the daily since late 2018 and have amounted over 3.3 thousand hours. There have been a lot of ups and downs with the updates but I held my faith in the game,But the recent decision the devs have made really ruined the game. Hit boxes just get worse with every update, they haven't done any worth while balancing since apparently it takes 4 months of work to change perks by such a minuscule amount a toddler could have done a better job. They abuse the fact they have no competitor by releasing expensive skins and giving us trash in return. I am profoundly disappointed in the game. I do not and will not recommend this to anyone.

I cannot, for the life of me, understand how such a TERRIBLE version made it to official servers. When they put the new animations and UI on PTB players gave the feedback they wanted-that they suck. But for some reason they decided to proceed anyways. The UI is a complete disaster, with information scattered around the screen. New animations are downright terrible and the new hitboxes are just... I have no idea how this sh*t even remotely survived PTB, or ANY testing if you ask me. The devs just don't give a shit about the playerbase, such a shame, the game was fun before they ruined it.

Edit: Oh yeah the ranking system is utterly broken too
Edit2: The Game rework is the worse map I've ever seen, I had no expectations for you Behavior but HOLY ****

Let me say I don't think this game is that much fun, but that's more a personal bias, I don't really care for the horror genre that much.

They fixed may of the bugs from the last update and my friend made me feel bad for giving it a bad review. I still only enjoy playing about 50% of the time when we have a good matchup. I've played this game  for long enough that I feel I should be able to expect a certain consistency of experience and  demonstrate a level of skill in each match.  but when I play i feel what happens in the first  few minutes of the match determines how well I will progress and how much fun the rest of the game will be. Its hard to recover from an early beat down.

Awful devs, they just ignore anything the community says. They ignore huge issues that most capable devs could've avoided if they just knew how to code. Fix hit detection, survivor is almost unplayable.
Update: It's still bad. After every update, it'll download, then proceed to take like an hour "unpacking". Then you'll have to launch it, get booted out because of EAC, verify integrity, download 6 GB worth of stuff, then also take an hour unpacking that stuff. Great devs haha. Also all cosmetics should be buyable with iri shards. They make enough money from all the DLC they have.
Mira la verdad, es divertido para jugar 3 veces al año, killers desbalanceados y teams con capacidades mentales reducidas.

The makers of this game never fail to somehow make this game harder to come home to every day. The 4.5.0 update is finally the one that broke it for me with the new UI, survivor locomotion, and killer hit registry, all of it being abysmal.

i want to love this game like i used to again, but it's so fucking hard when most of the fanbase is so toxic. BHVR is getting better bit by bit, i get that, but its the playerbase themselves that turn me off to the game. not only that, but skill based matchmaking is so incredibly frustrating. i'll be ash rank killer and get paired with gold and ruby rank survivors.

i love dead by daylight, but i hate the people that play it. y'all are the reason this game isn't fun anymore.
This game has gotten much better since they started caring about the hit box registration. GOOD JOB DEV TEAM! :)

我来评价两句吧，尽量客观，不过多少会有主观内容
新版ui客观来说还好，除了有一点像手游，可能是为了让pc端和手机端更像一些，提升手机玩家的体验，虽然可能没那味了，不过就目前来看还可以接受，但是有的地方还是改的太垃圾了。
别的不说，就这个人类的跑姿和站姿，跑步像是赶着上厕所一样，残血的时候捂着肚子，更像了，再拿一个红厕纸，绝了。
不过既然要客观一些地说，新版本的更新内容还是有可圈可点的地方的，就比如把人物的大头像贴在状态栏上面，虽然失去了杀鸡独有的一种美感，但是提升了屠夫玩家的体验，毕竟不用去试血祭品了，对大局的掌控也就更容易一些。
所以我觉得新版本的界面更新虽然缺漏更多一些，可是还没到无法接受的地步，如果改过来还是可以的，毕竟这么大的更新，失误也是无法避免。我觉得有一些朋友还是言重了一些，并且我一般都是在心态平稳一些的时候才会进行评价，被打崩了之后再评价可能会不可避免地带有戾气对吧😁

First. I am a casual player that played the game periodicaly for quite a while. So my perspective is basically that of a newby player that occiasionaly likes to play with randoms as killer or survivor.

So can i recommend the game?

The condition for that is if you dont like to win. If you dont like to win and considere the matches iniself as the major driving factor for you than yes.

If you actually want to win than no.

The game is completly unbalanced with a completly shitty matchmaking system. So expect as a beginner to lose ALOT.

Get ready for abuvise machanics from survisor or killers.

Get ready to face people with tons of perks at max rank while you have none.

Get ready for people that know every map in and out while you dont.

The last point is only a thing because you cant actually create a map with just yourself, as killer or survivor just to learn the map.

Can i recommend the game for a new player? Only of you put hours of effort into it or you just play it with your friends.
